page.title: 20Muchelney Pottery (2)
page.content: John Leach is now spending more time making individual pieces which are very different to the domestic ware.It is exhibited and sold locally,in London and in many other countries. John Leach also travels widely talking and demonstrating his skills.He has recently visited Alaska and Africa to help build woodfired kilns for native potters.Mrs Leach runs the shop and is responsible for all paperwork and dispatching of orders.The shop is visited by tourists but is well known locally with many people buying the pottery and using it daily in their kitchens.The range includes:plates, mugs,cups,coffee jugs,teapots,cider jars,breadcrocks, porringers,mixing bowls and storage jars. { {Authors of text:The children of Huish {Episcopi School and Mrs Amanda Chuter.
